summary: I have worked in several different capacities throughout my working career that have included working as a trade desk service representative, an Inside and Outside sales representative, a B2B and Retail Sales Manager, and a Director of Sales Operations. Across all these positions the topics of personal/business financial management and investment allocation and strategy have been topics I have specialized in. I have spent my last few years working with families/clients/organizations to achieve their financial/investment goals. I have knowledge and experience in working with clients around solutions regarding Personal Estate Planning, Personal/Institutional Retirement Planning, Asset Management, Investment/Trading strategies, Tax Favorable investment strategies, and Asset Allocation. I pride myself on my ability to work with others towards getting things done, being able to achieve and perform consistently at high levels, and working collaboratively to create Win-Win opportunities.
name: Christopher A Swan, MBA
title: Assistant Vice President at Merrill Lynch Wealth Management, Bank of America Corporation
